Longtime Democrat pollster and consultant Pat Caddell told Breitbart News Daily SiriusXM host Matt Boyle on Thursday, “The thing that I think we all should be thankful for is that the American people decided they were going to re-establish their sovereignty as the sovereign masters of this country and not the political class and their media outriders, who believed that the American people were pawns to be pushed around in some dynastic game between the Bushes, the Clintons, and others.”
